message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm also very aware of the time limit.  Let's get this started.
Your turn Alice. I believe in fairness, and I'm willing to be reasonable to avoid wasting time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fairer split than your last offer. Let's find some common ground.
Alice, let's be realistic. We both lose if this drags on. This is my final offer.
